tag_list: iphone, ios, iphone-app-templates, iphone-app-design, tapha-ngum, tapha, entrepreneur
overview:
Tapha Ngum is a 22 year old entrepreneur from London, England.

In late 2011, he founded Tapha Media Ltd, with its flagship product MyAppTemplates.com, to provide custom designed iphone app templates to developers and entrepreneurs who cannot design themeselves or cannot afford great design. It is basically to iphone apps what wordpress themes are to blogs.

external_links.title: KillerStartups - MyAppTemplates Founder Talk About Walking The Richard Branson Path And His iPhone App Templates
